Task: Turn off the living room light_202_2
Description: Locate light switch. Walk to light switch. Observe how light switch operates. Activate light switch.
Walk to table. Pick up waving statue. Face window. Throw waving statue at window.
Find the blinds and then open them
Find the bed and clean it
Try to put most of the sports equipment inside drawers and cabinet.
Find the basketball in the room and throw it at the window

Task: Turn off all the bedroom light_308_2
Description: Find the lightswitch. Turn it to the off position.
Walk over to the bed. Remove any items from the bed.
GO TO THE LIVING ROOM , LOWER THE CURTAINS DOWN .
Find the candle. Blow the candle out.
Walk to the sink. Turn the faucet on until the sink is filled. Put the towel in it. Wait for it to sink.
Turn on the sink tap and fill the sink basin with water. Then turn off the sink tap.
Firstly spray cleaning liquid from the spray bottle on the mirror. Then clean the mirror with the cloth.

Task: Throw away used toilet roll and soap bottle_403_2
Description: Firstly see if the toilet roll and soap bottle are completely used. Then throw them away in the bin.
Take the towel and hang it on the towel holder.
Open the shower door and use the shower head knob to turn on the shower head.
Take anything in the room which can be picked and used (like soap bottle, spray bottle etc) and hit the shower glass very hard to break it.
Place watch inside safe. Place creditcard inside safe. Close safe door. Lock safe.
Find the watering can to water the house plant behind the sofa.
Pack the box and keep it inside the safe.
Search for all the dirty cloths in the room. Collect them one by one. Take them to the Laundry Hamper. Open it and put the dirty cloth inside it. Then close it.
find kettle, put water into kettle, take kettle to stove, put kettle on stove, turn on burner with kettle, wait for water to boil.

Task: Fill up the bathtub with water_411_2
Description: go to bathroom, go to bath tub basin, turn on bathtub faucet
Walk to the shower. Grab the curtain and close it.
Make a cup of coffee, toast a slice of bread and make a fry egg

Task: Find the egg in the room_10_8
Description: Locate the egg in the room
Bring the fork and spoon and knife to the sink and wash them

Task: Turn on all the floor lamp_213_8
Description: Find the lamp and switch it on
Find the dirty cloth and run it through water from facuet
